sentence: In Wyoming, a ruby red, rural state that delivered nearly 70% of its vote to Trump in 2020, the former president can claim some momentum in his bid to oust Republican Rep. Liz Cheney.
author: David M. Drucker
title: Trump's GOP stranglehold faces major test in four primary battles
